caption:
I pray you live long not only because I don’t want to do life without you, but more importantly telling our children stories about who their father is would never do you any justice. 

If I haven’t done anything else right in this lifetime, I know for a fact, I’ve given my children the best father this side of Heaven. 

Hopefully, both of our sons grow up to be just like you, and prayerfully my daughter will marry someone just like her daddy as well. 

I love you forever🫶🏽 Happy Father’s Day!!!!
